name: CHAKSEHERDI HANDICAPPED SOCIETY
briefDescription: There are many handicapped person in our society and many poor girls, boys, women.  They have no source of income. There are many poor girls, women, boys, they have no educational qualification and there are many poor qualified girls, women and boys. Our local societies cultural are very poor. Many girls, women, boys work like Biri branding   as purification, which is very injurious to health. If we should arrange some vocasonal training for poor girls, women, boys and handicapped person then they will get a source of income as purification.
